attributes.title: Worst app in the world
attributes.review: I don’t even know where to begin this app was just horrible from the start. The download took a ridiculous amount of time. Trying to figure out how to work it too was another nightmare in itself. I will not be using this app anytime soon, I urge others to do the same.

attributes.title: 😡🧚‍♀️The only thing more horrible that this app is the most racist sexist orange president😡🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: With in the few days of haveing this app I have come in contact with many bugs and glitches on my phone. And it also took about 3-4 Buisness days to download and from downloading this app I have been reached by a ton of random numbers😡🤢

attributes.title: Not recommended at all
attributes.review: For some reason, this app took forever to download and that has never happened before. I tried using the app but it was very confusing. I don’t recommend downloading this app at all because it is not worth it. I don’t know why it’s still on app store to be honest.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: For starters it took A WEEK TO DOWNLOAD AND 69 MEGABYTES!!! WHAT TYPE OF APP IS THIS?! That’s not even the worst part! As soon as I opened the app, IT KILLED MY PHONE, THE BATTERY WAS COMPLETELY DRAINED!! I plugged my phone in and opened it while it was charging and it to me 12 tries for the app to stay open without it completely CRASHING! THEN TO TOP IT ALL OF I GOT 3 VIRUSES!!! LIKE WHATS GOING ON HERE!?!? DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO BE ABLE TO USE YOUR PHONE AGAIN!!! 😡😠😤🤬😢😭😱😨😰😥😞😔😖😣😫😩

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: bruh I don’t like this app this takes at least 5 hours to download, what kind of app is this!, I download it to see what’s going on, but now I see that this is the worst app I have ever gotten, no one wants this app especially from the orange from Donald Trump🍊, take this app down this is useless 😴 one one likes this app get rid of it

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Almost immediately after opening the app, my house was overrun with Karens. They’re clawing at my windows, slithering in through the pipes, and won’t stop asking for the manager. Worst app ever. I will not be downloading again and I definitely would not recommend this to ANYONE. Now I have to call an exterminator. Thanks a lot 😒

attributes.title: spam
attributes.review: I wanted to see what the app was for, if it would walk me through what our president had planned for the next 4 years, and was genuinely excited but the app kept closing every time I opened it. It would let me use it without it crashing. Hope they can find a way to fix it!

attributes.title: LIT CHRALLY DISGUSTING bruv 👅❤️🙈🥳🍑🎂
attributes.review: i wanted to see his plans for the campaign but i was unfortunately so upset at the fact that the app kept crashing. it honestly really upsetting. like, i am part of the tik tok community and i wanted to try this app out. it was bad. not great. terrible. sorry love. x. yes. no. make a better app for better causes. also arrest the cops who murdered breonna taylor. thank you.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: I keep trying to use it but it keeps crashing and I can’t even get on the app it just takes me to my home screen every time I click on it I think it has a bug or something because now my phone is acting up , the app is honestly worse than google classroom 🤭

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: So i opened the app and a whole JUNGLE popped out and he was like badabapbapbap welcome to chipotle could i get you some fish sticks from burger king then i was like where is my underwear? He took my underwear! 😡 Then I went for a walk and the ground started shaking and it was crazyyyy broooooo Then the world ended cause a meteor hit and then everything went black then the app died
